website_summaries.verdict: Adds a vintage touch to your foyer for a reasonable price.
pros: Lantern style without glass that needs cleaning
Adjustable chain suitable for rooms of all heights
cons: A few have complained about the metal being bent

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lights. Half the price of the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wrabel

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install - once you figure out the chain
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Lantern! very easy to hang up once you figure out how to cut the chain to correct size (wrap the pliers in duct tape until they are flush-no teeth- and then you can open and close without scrapping the finish off). Provides a lot of light. we got the LED 60watt and have to go get the 40watt instead.
customer_reviews.author: Elena O.

customer_reviews.title: I like that there is no glass to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is exactly as pictured. The description states that it is trimmed in gold which I really could not see on the picture, but it is there on the edges. I like that there is no glass to keep clean. The fixture was safely packaged and arrived on time when promised.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great update
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I didn’t install this light so I can’t speak to that, but I didn’t receive any complaints so that’s a good sign! We just bought a house and are replacing all of the light fixtures to more of the bronze/black farmhouse style. This was installed upstairs above the staircase and it looks great. One of my favorite light fixture replacements so far. Very classy. Easy to clean without glass and the price was reasonable compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Solid attractive light.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and well made. Be careful when buying led chandelier bulbs. They cannot have a metal heat shield which most of them have. You have to get the kind that looks like it is solid white from the bottom to about half way up. For now I just used the old style. Bigger than I thought it would be but still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light fixture for our kitchen being remodeled to add a fashionable touch. In comparison with other brands of similar chandeliers cost, it is reasonably priced. I am very pleased with the sturdy and elegant build of it. I like this light a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful light. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful light. Easy to install. Nice and light so it was easier to hang in our high foyer. Thank you for making stylish, quality, and affordable lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty updated light!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, easy to install, great updated look! I hired an electrician to install along with another light fixture. This one took them less than 5 minutes. I’m sure if I wanted to do myself it might take longer but I did not want to be inconvenienced.
customer_reviews.author: chloemom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light fixture. You want go wrong with this one. I like that it doesn’t have and glass on it. I don’t like cleaning the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Amazingly Sturdy for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Really, really pleased with the purchase. Modern but not too modern (read: it won't look dated in 5 years). Surprisingly heavy-duty for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Nice, quality light.  Good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking, quality light. Was concerned about buying it without seeing it in person but was happy with both quality and color.
customer_reviews.author: Denise HTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Great update to our house.
customer_reviews.text: These light fixtures replaced some 35yr old ones that I've always disliked. They look fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: tamediamix

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it’s amazing it transformed my hallway I absolutely love it . Great quality works great i installed led bulbs and it super
customer_reviews.author: LovingLife

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LIGHTS
customer_reviews.text: USED THESE FOR PENDANTS OVER A 7' ISLAND ON MY FLIP HOME. THEY ARE GORGEOUS AND EVERYONE LOVED THEM; THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect lights for vey reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect lights for vey reasonable price . I love them in my foyer. The chains are too tall I had to completely remove them chains in order to suit the size of my hallway. It's perfect for tall ceiling. I would give it 5 star. Please purchase if you want your house to look modern and beautiful and reasonable priced again. Heads up 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Samar imran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hall or stairway light. We use this with a dimmer fro a subdued candle light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light nice price
customer_reviews.text: Nice light and good quality. Wasn't hard to install and much cheaper than similar lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jemaus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Bought this for the area above our half ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Bought this for the area above our half landing and it looks lovely and gives off a much improved light.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Tate

customer_reviews.title: ... a little flimsy but for the price we are pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The metal is a little flimsy but for the price we are pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Major Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Love this lighting fixture it looks perfect in my entryway
customer_reviews.text: Love this lighting fixture it looks perfect in my entryway. Only thing is it has a lot more gold/yellow then I thought. But still really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Firas Totri

customer_reviews.title: Great Farmhouse Foyer Light
customer_reviews.text: My husband just hung up the light in our foyer. It looks terrific, especially since I was going for the whole farmhouse look. My husband even said that the light appears to be made of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: It’s well built.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bathroom and entrance hall. It’s well built with heavy metal. Exactly what the picture showed me. A good looking piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: This looks gorgeous in my foyer. I should have bought more. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean, classic style
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is perfect in the foyer of my son's home. It's a clean, unfussy look with bright light for the stairway. We like the lantern style without glass to maintain in this 2-story foyer!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila T.

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This looks so nice for the price! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RQ

customer_reviews.title: So Simple and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: This fits into my front hallway decor perfectly. Love the simple lines; and it's easy to clean because there are no glass panels.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy MLH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received three lantern lights from your company. They seem to be very substantial and I think they will be beautiful in our new kitchen. I am anxious to see how they look once they are installed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This light really screams farmhouse. We love it for our dining room. Simple in design, yet adds a ton of character.
customer_reviews.author: P. Crump

customer_reviews.title: Love the Light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fixture for my foyer. Definitely updated the room
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Look at item as soon as you receive your purchase..
customer_reviews.text: I like that it looks well made and great color.Great design .It looks just like what the picture look like . The cost was perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: Terry.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The light is solidly built and was easier to install than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Strelke

customer_reviews.title: All descriptions were accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I hung this over my breakfast table, I have a rustic farmhouse type house, it went very well with the decor. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Turtle License Plate Frames Inc

customer_reviews.title: It looked very beautiful. I was very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of this and placed 2 over our long kitchen island and one over our breakfast nook. It looked very beautiful. I was very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CherryF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture!
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are very sturdy and beautiful. They are a great value and also look great in our space!
customer_reviews.author: Seaboard Controls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our dining room, easy to assemble and put up
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Osting

customer_reviews.title: The fixture is very nice looking just as it did in the photos
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived quickly and without any damage. The fixture is very nice looking just as it did in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Solid and sturdy but not too heavy. Looks great hanging in my stairwell and adds great light.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Woods

customer_reviews.title: Entryway light
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Very nice and elegant light for our new home.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a great price. Completely satisfied with these light fixtures and will buy them again
customer_reviews.author: drewwine

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for, and at a good price to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we wanted - easy to install - looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: aaron norwood

customer_reviews.title: Country looking lighting we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just hooked this light fixture up! Love it ! It was exactly what we needed for our entryway😍
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hanging lamp for our foyer. Perfect in every way! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love! Look so good as pendant lights above our island
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Simonin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We chose the fixture based on it's look and price. We're building a new home and plan to install the fixture in our foyer. We received the package and it looks great. So far, we are very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Irwin

customer_reviews.title: This light is very pretty. We moved into a smaller house and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This light is very pretty. We moved into a smaller house and I bought this to hang over our dining table . Wish we could've kept it but it was too large for the space so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin

product_meta.title: Kira Home Amesbury 21" 4-Light Farmhouse Lantern Chandelier, Bird Cage Entry Light, Oil Rubbed Bronze Finish
feature_bullets: VINTAGE FOYER LANTERN: Classic oil rubbed bronze light fixture with sturdy metal frame showcases a stunning hand-painted gold trim around a candelabra base. Fits many styles including rustic farmhouse and modern. Enhance your space with its gorgeous glow

ELEVATE ANY SPACE: Mount this farm style foyer light made from heavy duty metal in many areas. Perfect for locations with high ceilings such as foyers or entryways, over kitchen and dining room tables or kitchen islands. Dimmer & sloped ceiling compatible

UL LISTED FOR YOUR SAFETY: UL listed for dry locations. Uses (4) LED, CFL, or up to 60W Type B candelabra base bulbs. Easily install and change bulbs with the shade's open design. Bulbs sold separately
DIMENSIONS: Bird Cage Lantern: 21" (H) x 9.5" (L) x 9.5" (W), Canopy: 5.5" (D) x 1.25" (H). Includes 72" of adjustable chain for desired hanging height. Minimum/Maximum: 26"-97"

UNMATCHED QUALITY AND CUSTOMER CARE: Designed and supported in California. Quality, innovation, and attractive products are our motto. We provide a 1-year warranty when purchased from an authorized dealer. Shop with confidence!
